text: Taura kuti: Kana madzibaba enyu, vana venyu, madzikoma enyu, vakadzi venyu, hama dzenyu, hupfumi hwamakawana, mabhizimusi amunotyira kuti angangodzikira, uye dzimba dzamunofarira, kana muchinyanya kuzvida kupfuura Allah nemutumwa wavo (SAW), uye kushanda nesimba pamwe nekurwa munzira yaAllah, zvino chimirirai kusvikira Allah vaunza mutongo wavo. Uye Allah havatungamiriri avo vasingateereri
